channel.title: American Thinker
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.

item.title: White and Wrong in Philly
item.description: Are white people in Philadelphia allowed to talk about race at all?

item.title: Karl Rove and Republican Decline
item.description: His fingerprints are all over the Party Establishment mess, as well as their estrangement from the rest of the country

item.title: The Price of Gay Marriage: The Galvanic Corrosion of Language
item.description: The gay marriage movement is nothing more than wholesale narcissism. But, of course, we have become a nation of narcissists, so what did you expect?

item.title: Fighting the Immigration Wars
item.description: Workable plans exist for controlling the border and solving the immigration crisis. But will the Obama administration allow any of them to proceed?

item.title: A New Path to a Balanced Budget?
item.description: It's time for a true "Grand Bargain" to balance the budget. It will not be difficult, provided the GOP can stand strong on some crucial points.

item.title: Turkey's ErdoÄŸan and the Zenith of Hypocrisy
item.description: For Islamist Turkey to accuse Israel of committing war crimes is especially rich - and ironic.

item.title: Advice from Sheryl Sandberg: Lean In to Discover It's Your Fault
item.description: The billionaire female Facebook executive write a "feminist manifesto."

item.title: Ben Carson's Problematic Views on Health Care
item.description: With his inspiring life story and soaring rhetoric, Dr. Ben Carson has favorably impressed America's conservatives. But is he too good to be true?

item.title: The Politics of Demographics
item.description: Engineering an electorate

item.title: Deconstructing America
item.description: America as de facto "Jailer of the Emergent Progressive Soul?" The "bloody boot" impressed upon the neck of the poor? Thanks to postmodern deconstruction of truth, all too many believe exaclty that.

item.title: Priebus's GOP Autopsy Misses the Point
item.description: The GOP's recently unveiled "reboot" is a start -- but only a start. Republicans are chronically making classic rookie mistakes.

item.title: Boehner Says He 'Absolutely' Trusts Obama - We Are in Trouble Now
item.description: Almost as unbelievable as any claim Obama makes that isn't in far-left dream-land.

item.title: The Annulment of Same-sex Marriage
item.description: Attempting to redefine something as basic to biology as gravity is to physics is dangerous and destructive

item.title: The Cypriot Domino
item.description: Cypru smay prove the first domino in a collapse of the Eurozone financial system, whose falling pieces will almost surely affect America.

item.title: Sheriff Cruz Meets School Marm Feinstein
item.description: Feinstein came armed with a scowl and a ruler when she confronted Cruz at the Constitution Corral.

item.title: Drones in Wonderland
item.description: For now, we're supposed to trust an administration that holds, potentially unrestrained by the right to due process, all the keys -- to detention facilities and the drones.

item.title: World Opinion: Getting it Wrong
item.description: We need to make an effort to show "a decent respect for the opinion of mankind." But not to the point where it cripples us.

item.title: Why the NRA is Right about Hollywood
item.description: Much fire has been directed at gun advocates in general and the National Rifle Association in particular. In response, the organization has implicated Hollywood and popular culture in general for mainstreaming mindless violence.

item.title: Looking Beyond the Budget Duel
item.description: The administration appears to have believed their own lies involving ObamaCare. The upcoming result? The most almighty train wreck you ever saw.

item.title: Outsourcing the Poor
item.description: Despite the hopes of liberals that Pope Francis will be one of their own in a surplice, serious divergences between the Church and modern liberalism will remain.

item.title: Stopping the Inevitable
item.description: 'A democracy can only exist until the voters discover they can vote themselves largess out of the public treasury.' But why should a parasitic class have the right to vote?

item.title: The Other Drone Question: Is Obama Building A Federal Police Force?
item.description: DHS appears to be planning a vast surveillance network, and it is rapidly developing the technology to create it, usurping many functions that used to be handled by local law enforcement without any help from the federal government.

item.title: Feminist Leaders Compared to Religious Right Leaders
item.description: How do the feminist icons of old compare to the "barefoot women in the kitchen"?

item.title: Boehner to Keep Funding ObamaCare
item.description: All these symbolic votes House Republicans cast against ObamaCare mean less than voting for your favorite American Idol contestant. The GOP needs to get real.

item.title: Is Pope Francis Liberal or Conservative?
item.description: Like all popes, the new one operates according to principles that are neither left nor right nor center... but eternal.
